Detailed Description

Class handling hash keys.

This class manages creating hash keys for positions on the board ( according to Zobrist hashing method ), class Hash_table manager manages hashing itself.

Member Function Documentation

void init_hash_board (  ) 

Initialization of board.

Here hash_board is filled with random hash keys.

void xor_with_position_hash ( Coordinates  coordinates_,
Stone_color  stone_color_ 
)

Creating new position hash from the old one.

Parameters:
[in] coordinates_ Coordinates of a played stone.
[in] stone_color_ Stone color ( white or black ) of the played stone. Zobrist hashing ... adding / removing a stone is equal to xoring with position hash this function is called at two places ... function Board_manager::play_a_stone for single played stone and at function Board_manager::capture_block for each captured stone
